header: BRIEF-NTT and microsoft to share info on threats to cybersecurity - Nikkei
body: * Nippon Telegraph & Telephone Group and Microsoft will share information on threats to cybersecurity in an effort to better protect clients - Nikkei Source text (s.nikkei.com/1MpEN8G) Further company coverage:
